TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1 turns.[NEWLINE]This order sacrifice the slave, leading to extra happiness and celebrations in the city for %d2 turns. This will consume the slave.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifier[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] pendant %d1 tours.[NEWLINE]Cet ordre sacrifie l'esclave, causant des célébrations et du bonheur dans la ville pendant %d2 tours. L'esclave sera détruit.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1 turns.[NEWLINE]This order sacrifice the slave, leading to extra happiness and celebrations in the city for %d2 turns. This will consume the slave.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1 turns.[NEWLINE]This order sacrifice the slave, leading to extra happiness and celebrations in the city for %d2 turns. This will consume the slave.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sacrifice[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1 turns.[NEWLINE]This order sacrifice the slave, leading to extra happiness and celebrations in the city for %d2 turns. This will consume the slave.

TEXT.English: The Great Person will make another civilization forget your past transgressions and improve your relations. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.French: Le personnage illustre fera oublier à la civilisation vos transgressions passées et améliorera vos relations. Cela consomme le personnage illustre.
TEXT.German: Die Große Persönlichkeit wird eine andere Zivilisation eure Vergehen aus der Vergangenheit vergessen lassen und eure Beziehungen verbessern. Die Große Persönlichkeit wird dabei aufgebraucht.
TEXT.Italian: The Great Person will make another civilization forget your past transgressions and improve your relations. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Spanish: The Great Person will make another civilization forget your past transgressions and improve your relations. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: The Great Person will broker an immediate peace treaty between you and your enemy. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.French: Le personnage illustre négociera un traité de paix immédiat entre vous et votre ennemi. Cela consomme le personnage illustre.
TEXT.German: Die Große Persönlichkeit wird einen unmittelbaren Friedensvertrag zwischen Euch und Eurem Feind aushandeln. Die Große Persönlichkeit wird dabei aufgebraucht.
TEXT.Italian: The Great Person will broker an immediate peace treaty between you and your enemy. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Spanish: The Great Person will broker an immediate peace treaty between you and your enemy. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: Attempts to remove one non-State religion from the city. This will consume the Prosecutor.
TEXT.French: Tente de purger la ville d'une religion non officielle. Cela consomme l'inquisiteur.
TEXT.German: Attempts to remove one non-State religion from the city. This will consume the Prosecutor.
TEXT.Italian: Attempts to remove one non-State religion from the city. This will consume the Prosecutor.
TEXT.Spanish: Attempts to remove one non-State religion from the city. This will consume the Prosecutor.

TEXT.English: This will order the Great Person to reform your government, allowing you to change civics this turn without any anarchy. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.French: Ordonne au personnage illustre de réformer votre gouvernement, ce qui vous permet de changer vos doctrines sans anarchie pour ce tour. Cela consomme le personnage illustre.
TEXT.German: Dies wird die Großen Persönlichkeit veranlassen, Eure Regierung zu reformieren, was Euch erlaubt diese Runde Staatsformen ohne jegliche Anarchie zu wechseln. Die Große Persönlichkeit wird dabei aufgebraucht.
TEXT.Italian: This will order the Great Person to reform your government, allowing you to change civics this turn without any anarchy. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Spanish: This will order the Great Person to reform your government, allowing you to change civics this turn without any anarchy. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: This will order the Great Person to end the anarchy in your civilization and the unrest in all your cities. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.French: Ordonne au personnage illustre de mettre fin à l'anarchie de votre civilisation et à l'agitation dans toutes vos villes. Cela consomme le personnage illustre.
TEXT.German: Dies wird die Große Persönlichkeit veranlassen, the Anarchie in Eurer Zivilisation sowie den Aufruhr in all Euren Städten zu beenden. Die Große Persönlichkeit wird dabei aufgebraucht.
TEXT.Italian: This will order the Great Person to end the anarchy in your civilization and the unrest in all your cities. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Spanish: This will order the Great Person to end the anarchy in your civilization and the unrest in all your cities. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: The Great Person will spread your state religion in several surrounding cities, potentially causing other religions to leave. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.French: Le personnage illustre propagera votre religion d'État dans plusieurs villes environnantes, faisant éventuellement disparaître d'autres religions. Cela consomme le personnage illustre.
TEXT.German: Die Große Persönlichkeit wird Eure Staatsreligion in mehreren Städten in der Umgebung verbreiten und dabei möglicherweise andere Religionen entfernen. Die Große Persönlichkeit wird dabei aufgebraucht.
TEXT.Italian: The Great Person will spread your state religion in several surrounding cities, potentially causing other religions to leave. It consumes the Great Person.
TEXT.Spanish: The Great Person will spread your state religion in several surrounding cities, potentially causing other religions to leave. It consumes the Great Person.

TEXT.English: This order will consume one or more Great People (of different types) and initiate a Golden Age (extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.French: Cet ordre consommera plusieurs personnages illustres (de types différents) et déclenchera un âge d'or ([ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] supplémentaires).
TEXT.German: Opfern Sie eine oder mehrere Große Persönlichkeiten (unterschiedlicher Klassen), um ein Goldenes Zeitalter (zusätzliche [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], keine Anarchie) zu begründen.
TEXT.Italian: Con questo ordine si consumano uno o più Grandi Personaggi (di tipi differenti) e si avvia un'Età dell'Oro (extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Esta orden consume uno o más grandes personajes (de diferentes tipos) e inicia una edad de oro (extra [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).

TEXT.English: Lets you see more details about a rival civilization's espionage against you in the Espionage Advisor.
TEXT.French: Vous donne davantage de détails (dans l'écran du conseiller à l'espionnage) sur l'espionnage qu'une civilisation rivale a contre vous.
TEXT.German: Zeigt zusätzliche Details über die Spionage einer gegnerischen Zivilisation im Spionageberater an
TEXT.Italian: Lets you see more details about a rival civilization's espionage against you in the Espionage Advisor.
TEXT.Spanish: Lets you see more details about a rival civilization's espionage against you in the Espionage Advisor.

TEXT.English: The Satellite will destroy an enemy Satellite on the same tile.
TEXT.French: The Satellite will destroy an enemy Satellite on the same tile.
TEXT.German: Der Satellit wird einen gegnerischen Satellit auf demselben Feld zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: The Satellite will destroy an enemy Satellite on the same tile.
TEXT.Spanish: The Satellite will destroy an enemy Satellite on the same tile.
